author: bmwlego
title: Should Have Been Included in a "Content" Meal, not a Happy Meal
review: Another garage sale find. This set is an ok boat but it is really simple, plain and made from regular colored bricks. The slope decoration is printed and there is a propeller included but everything else is standard LEGO bricks in red or blue. Not much to make you run out and buy this set, unless you want to complete the series.

author: Zackula
title: My first set!
review: This was my very first LEGO set ever.  I can blame my LEGO addiction on this.  It is a very simple build, but since I was about four, and it was my first set, I think it took a while.  It includes a printed slope with that blue fuzzy mascot.  No other useful parts, but it was free, so it had good parts for that.  Fun to play with as a four year old, not so much now.  It was free, so great value for money.  I wish LEGO made more sets like these.  I think that my LEGO purchases could easily have paid for all of these toys given out at that McDonald's with money left over.
